```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  setTimeout(function() {
    const listingContainer = document.getElementById('projects-listing');
    if (!listingContainer) return;
    
    // æŸ¥æ‰¾æ–‡ç« é¡¹
    const listingItems = listingContainer.querySelectorAll('.quarto-post, .list-item, [class*="listing-item"], .card, .g-col-1, article, .quarto-grid-item');
    
    let projects = [];
    
    if (listingItems.length > 0) {
      listingItems.forEach((item) => {
        const titleEl = item.querySelector('a.title, .listing-title a, .card-title a, h3 a, h2 a, .title a, a[href*="posts"]');
        const categoryEls = item.querySelectorAll('.listing-category, .quarto-category, .category, [class*="category"]');
        const dateEl = item.querySelector('.listing-date, .date, [class*="date"], time');
        
        if (titleEl) {
          const categories = [];
          categoryEls.forEach(c => categories.push(c.textContent.trim()));
          
          projects.push({
            title: titleEl.textContent.trim(),
            url: titleEl.href,
            category: categories.length > 0 ? categories[0] : 'æœªåˆ†ç±»',
            date: dateEl ? dateEl.textContent.trim() : ''
          });
        }
      });
    }
    
    // å¤‡ç”¨æ–¹æ¡ˆ
    if (projects.length === 0) {
      const allLinks = listingContainer.querySelectorAll('a[href*="posts/projects"]');
      allLinks.forEach(link => {
        if (link.textContent.trim() && !link.classList.contains('listing-category')) {
          projects.push({
            title: link.textContent.trim(),
            url: link.href,
            category: 'é¡¹ç›®',
            date: ''
          });
        }
      });
    }
    
    // æ›´æ–°ç»Ÿè®¡
    const projectCountEl = document.getElementById('project-count');
    if (projectCountEl) {
      projectCountEl.textContent = projects.length;
    }
    
    const categories = new Set();
    projects.forEach(p => {
      if (p.category) categories.add(p.category);
    });
    const categoryCountEl = document.getElementById('project-category-count');
    if (categoryCountEl) {
      categoryCountEl.textContent = categories.size;
    }
    
    if (projects.length > 0 && projects[0].date) {
      const latestDateEl = document.getElementById('project-latest-date');
      if (latestDateEl) {
        latestDateEl.textContent = projects[0].date.slice(0, 7) || '-';
      }
    }
    
  }, 500);
});
</script>
```
